issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

dns.adguard.com

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kaufland.Kaufland&hl=ro&gl=US

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
Hello, on my android device I'm using dns.adguard.com as my private DNS, The issue is with a retailer app (kaufland app -package:com.kaufland.Kaufland). Since an update about 3 weeks ago, whenever I try to access the leaflet (the supermarket catalogue) from within the app get a network error. If I revert the phone to my ISP DNS, the app works normal, so I guess it is a bad AdGuard filter. Can you please fix it? Thanks.


https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/75840436/173083326-98640e6a-7519-44c1-bcf6-44c65e5ccd71.mp4




### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.drive2.ru](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.drive2.ru) ### Comment > Реклама блокируется везде, кроме сайта "drive2.ru". Обновление и переустановка расширений не помогла. Пробовал открыть сайт https://www.drive2.ruв других браузерах: Google Chrome и Microsoft Edge. Заметил интересный факт. При первом открытии сайта «drive2.ru», в обоих браузерах, не было значка помощника. Но и не было рекламы. При перетаскивании окна  браузера с основного монитора на второй, появилась реклама и больше не фильтровалась. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/YttsjJ4.png)
